charoption.name: Villager
entries: Improved Background. This feature replaces the background of your character. As a simple villiger, you gain the following benefits:

items: Hardy body. +2 to all saving throws
Untapped potential. +2 to any ability score

charoption.name: Noble
entries: You grew up around wealth and noblilty, thus gaining the following benefits:

items: Noble education. You learn two additional languages/proficiencies and gain a +1 to any two ability scores.
